casebody.data:
Chris NIELSON et al., copartners trading under the firm name and style of Dauntless Towing Line, owner of the tug Dauntless No. 6, Libelant-Appellee, v. UNITED STATES of America, as owner of the S.S. Christopher Gale, Respondent-Appellant. THE DAUNTLESS NO. 6. THE CHRISTOPHER GALE. No. 144, Docket 22914. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Feb. 1, 1954. Decided Feb. 15, 1954. Gilbert S. Fleischer, New York City, Atty., Dept. ' of Justice (Leonard P. Moore, U. S. Atty., New York City, and Walter L. Hopkins, New York City, and E. Robert Seaver, Kansas , City, Mo., Attys., Dept, of Justice, on the brief), for respondent-appellant. Anthony V. Lynch, Jr., - New York City (Pyne, Lynch & Smith and .Vincent J. Ryan, New York City, on the brief), for libelant-appellee.

Before CLARK, FRANK and HINCKS, Circuit-Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on- the opinion of District Judge Galston beíow, D.C.E.D.N.Y., 112 F. Supp. 730.
